message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for both of us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. I'm willing to start with an offer of $1100000 for the product.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your offer of $900000, Bob, but I'm afraid I need to make a bit more to make it worth my while. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1050000 for the product.
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're still a bit hesitant about the price, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer $1025000 for the product. This is the best I can do, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you're still a bit above my last offer, Bob. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering $1050000 is too low, I'm going to try a different approach. I'm willing to sell the product for $1075000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product, as I mentioned in my previous offer. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I've already made several concessions, Bob, and I'm starting to think that we're not going to meet in the middle. I'm willing to make one final offer, but I need to make sure I get a price that's closer to what I'm looking for. I'm now offering $1075000 is too high, I'll go back to my previous offer of $1050000 is too low, I'll meet you in the middle of my previous offers. I'm now offering $1012500 for the product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product, as I mentioned in my previous offers. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
